[Power port] -- [Power port] --

[Device housing] --

node Computer node User node "Power supply" as PS
Computer ..> (int-3): use User ..> : use PS ..> : use
architecture.description: A power port accessible by the user and used to charge the device.

interface.description: The device connects to a power supply via a connector for charging.
interface.mechanical: The power interface shall be a micro-USB power connector.
The power supply shall contain the plug, the device shall contain the jack.
interface.electrical: The device shall receive 1A max, 5V +/- 25mV via the power interface.

interface.description: The device has a physical port on the front panel for charging.
interface.mechanical: LED shall fit a 3.1 mm diameter hole on the housing.
LED shall be yellow in color.
interface.electrical: The LED shall receive forward current 20mA.
interface.software: The LED shall be blinking at 2 second interval.
